title: 145. Workforce, Procedural & Tech Shifts | Another Broken Egg Cafe
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Paul Macaluso, the president and chief executive officer of Another Broken Egg. Barron and Macaluso explore how operators are innovating their workforce, technology, and menus.
